name: Re:Zard
description:
Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2 by @IDidGame

play coop with yourself be rewinding time

Controls:

MoveWASDLStickAimMouseRStickAttack(Hold)
LClickRB

while attacking keep an eye on the attack meter
(bottom right) hit the light area for a special attack

Tools used:
Engine - Unity2020.1
IDE - VSCommunity2019
Sounds - SFXR
Models - Blender

Assets used:
Character Models/Animations - Quaternius.com
Environment Models - Kenney.nl
Leaderboard - globalstats.io

https://github.com/Schossi/Brackeys202

no webgl build this time, tried for six hours but no dice
